meanings.definition: (Latin) cheerful, merry, gay, jovial, mirthful, glad, rejoicing
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) cheerful, merry, gay, jovial, mirthful, glad, rejoicing

usage_notes.explanation: 'hilaris' is a Latin adjective. It is used to describe a state of cheerfulness or merriment. It is not commonly used in modern English, but it is the root of the English word 'hilarious'.
